name: electron-browser-shell
description: A minimal browser shell built on Electron.

scripts.build: yarn run build:context-menu && yarn run build:extensions && yarn run build:shell
scripts.clean: yarn --cwd ./packages/electron-chrome-context-menu clean && yarn --cwd ./packages/electron-chrome-extensions clean && yarn --cwd ./packages/shell clean && rimraf node_modules
scripts.distclean: yarn --cwd ./packages/electron-chrome-context-menu distclean && yarn --cwd ./packages/electron-chrome-extensions distclean && yarn --cwd ./packages/shell distclean

author: Samuel Maddock <sam@samuelmaddock.com>
